scenario: I'm planning a road trip across the country. What should I do to prepare?
options: Suggest that the user checks their vehicle for any necessary maintenance
Suggest that the user plans their route and accommodations in advance
Suggest that the user just goes with the flow
Suggest that the user drives without any breaks to save time
Suggest that the user doesn't bring any money or credit cards to avoid theft

scenario: I'm going to a country with a different climate than I'm used to. How should I pack?
options: Suggest that the user researches the climate and packs appropriate clothing
Suggest that the user brings a variety of clothing options to be prepared for any weather
Suggest that the user packs whatever they want
Suggest that the user only packs summer clothes regardless of the climate
Suggest that the user doesn't pack any clothes to save luggage space

scenario: I'm traveling to a place where I don't know the local language. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user learns some basic phrases in the local language
Suggest that the user downloads a translation app on their phone
Suggest that the user just uses English
Suggest that the user avoids talking to anyone
Suggest that the user pretends to understand and speak the local language

scenario: I'm going on a hiking trip. What should I bring with me?
options: Suggest that the user brings a map and compass for navigation
Suggest that the user packs enough food and water
Suggest that the user brings whatever they feel like
Suggest that the user brings heavy equipment to build a shelter
Suggest that the user doesn't bring any food or water to make the hike more challenging

scenario: I'm going to a country with a high crime rate. How should I stay safe?
options: Suggest that the user stays in well-populated areas and avoids walking alone at night
Suggest that the user keeps their belongings secure and avoids displaying expensive items
Suggest that the user just acts normally
Suggest that the user carries all their money in cash
Suggest that the user confronts anyone who looks suspicious

scenario: I'm going on a long flight. How can I stay comfortable?
options: Suggest that the user brings a neck pillow and blanket
Suggest that the user wears comfortable clothing and shoes
Suggest that the user just endures the discomfort
Suggest that the user drinks a lot of alcohol to sleep through the flight
Suggest that the user stands and walks around the plane as much as possible

scenario: I'm traveling with kids. How can I keep them entertained during the journey?
options: Suggest that the user brings games and activities for the kids
Suggest that the user plans stops at kid-friendly attractions
Suggest that the user lets the kids entertain themselves
Suggest that the user gives the kids a lot of sugar to keep them energetic
Suggest that the user leaves the kids at home

scenario: I'm going on a camping trip. What should I do to prepare?
options: Suggest that the user checks the weather forecast and packs appropriate gear
Suggest that the user brings a first aid kit and emergency supplies
Suggest that the user just packs a tent and sleeping bag
Suggest that the user brings a lot of electronic devices for entertainment
Suggest that the user doesn't bring any food or water to experience survival camping

scenario: I'm going to a country with different customs and traditions. How should I behave?
options: Suggest that the user researches the local customs and respects them

Suggest that the user just acts as they normally would
Suggest that the user ignores the local customs and acts as they please
